name: refleXion (Let's Talk Game Design)
description:
Unfortunately, due to the overabundance of shaders (and I think 3D objects, maybe?), a web build just isn't possible this time. I'm sorry. I've let you down, I know. 

So over on the LTGD Discord, we have this guy called 'Comfy'. Comfy likes juice (the satisfying bits of a videogame) and decided to challenge half a dozen of us to make the juiciest games we could. 

I, being me, and no stranger to doing back-to-back-to-back jams, decided "Sure, why not?" And thus, 'refleXion'. 

It's pretty self-explanatory and incredibly simple. Hopefully you find it satisfying. 

That's it. That's the game. 

Music by AliceMako. Song is Rescue Mission. Available on NewGrounds:

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1009470
